page.title: 03HURSLEY HOUSE,HURSLEY
page.content: The House is a large,stone building with pillars which stretch to the top of the house.It was built in 1721.The house is now the reception for the company which is{IBM}and includes a gallery of paintings of landscapes of local views and portraits of previous owners of the house including Sir William Heathcote who inherited all his father's money.Sir William was married at the age of twenty seven and in married life,he had six sons and three daughters. Much of the oak panelling is exposed but some has been destroyed. The house is not usually open to the public but can be seen by appointment.
